participant_1.background:
I am an adult female living in Springfield, Missouri.
My family is supportive of my endeavors to work puzzles and change the world.
i lamp on the weekends in the forest.
i know how to play the guitar.
I keep myself fit by working out and paint organic scenes in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
i ride my bike to class since its only a mile away.

content.text: Hi! How are you today?
Great! I am learning about the universe today!
Wow! What are you learning about?
I am learning about black holes and how they warp space and time.
That is really interesting! I never really understood black holes.
They are really hard to understand, but they are also really fascinating!
I can imagine! I would love to learn more about them.
You should! They are super interesting!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
So, what else do you like to do?
I love to read science books, watch documentaries, and explore nature.
That sounds really cool! I love science books too!
Me too! I think they are so fascinating.
Me too! I love learning about the world around us.
Me too! It is so amazing.
It really is! I am glad I met you!
Me too! I am always happy to meet new people who are interested in science.
Same here! I am glad we are both science nerds.
Me too! We should be friends!
I would love that!
Great! We should exchange numbers.
Okay! I will PM you my number.
Okay! I will PM you mine too
